welcome_benefits: Earn 2,000 Reward Points within 30 days of card issuance

Rewards Rate: 10% cashback up to ₹500 on purchases made at Patanjali stores; 1 RP for every ₹100 spent on offline and online transactions
Reward Redemption: RP earned can be redeemed on the RBL Rewards portal

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual fee is waived for spending of ₹1.5 lakhs
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver up to ₹150 on transactions between ₹500 to ₹4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the cash amount or a minimum of ₹500

product_details: This card can be linked with UPI apps.
The annual fee waiver of this card is ₹1.5 lakhs.
Patanjali voucher worth ₹500 on annual spends of ₹2.5 lakhs.
1% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions.
This card comes under the NCMC program and can be easily loaded.
